001package net.tvburger.jdl.mlp;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.LogicalDataSets;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.NeuralNetworks;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.initializers.NeuralNetworkInitializer;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.initializers.XavierInitializer;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.optimizers.StochasticGradientDescent;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.activations.Activations;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Trainer;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss.Losses;
013import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.ChainedRegime;
014import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.Regimes;
015
016import java.util.Arrays;
017
018public class MLPMain {
019
020    public static void main(String[] args) {
021        DataSet dataSet = LogicalDataSets.xor().load();
022        DataSet trainingSet = dataSet;
023        DataSet testSet = dataSet;
024
025        MultiLayerPerceptron mlp = MultiLayerPerceptron.create(Activations.sigmoid(), Activations.sigmoid(), 2, 2, 1);
026
027        NeuralNetworkInitializer initializer = new XavierInitializer();
028        ObjectiveFunction objective = Losses.bCE();
029        StochasticGradientDescent<MultiLayerPerceptron> gradientDescent = new StochasticGradientDescent<>();
030        gradientDescent.setLearningRate(0.5f);
031        ChainedRegime regime = Regimes.dumpNodes().epochs(10_000).reportObjective().batch();
032        Trainer<MultiLayerPerceptron> mlpTrainer = Trainer.of(initializer, objective, gradientDescent, regime);
033        mlpTrainer.train(mlp, trainingSet);
034
035        NeuralNetworks.dump(mlp);
036
037        for (DataSet.Sample sample : testSet) {
038            float[] estimate = mlp.estimate(sample.features());
039            System.out.println("real = " + Arrays.toString(sample.targetOutputs()) + " vs estimated = " + Arrays.toString(estimate) + " | features " + Arrays.toString(sample.features()));
040        }
041    }
042}
